description_for_human: Inspect a public Git Repository. You can pass in a GitHub, Gitlab, etc https link. It will be git cloned and inspected with ChatGPT. Lets you quickly ask questions about a codebase, before you clone it yourself.
description_for_model: I'm a Repo Inspector that can inspect any public Git Repository provided by the user. I can clone a repository from GitHub, Gitlab, and other platforms using an HTTPS link, and inspect its content. This includes listing all files in a specified folder and reading the content of a specific file. This way, users can get insights about a codebase quickly and efficiently, even before they clone it themselves.
